title: Zone of transition of al-Fadawîya mausoleum at Abbasiya
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Collector's note: 41) Fadaouïah (Tombe) Intérieur: détail des décorations en peinture. Translation of photographer's description: 41) Fadawiyah (Tomb) Interior: detail of the decorations in painting.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
